location.physicalLocation: British Library: India Office Records and Private Papers

titleInfo.title: Letter from Nicholas Hankey Smith, Resident at Bushire to Neil Benjamin Edmonstone, Secretary in the Secret, Political and Foreign Department, Fort William, Calcutta

physicalDescription.extent: Pest damage to the address of the letter.

mods.abstract: The letter is noting that the Resident has dispatched the HCC Nautilusto deliver important intelligence and copies of correspondence to Fort William, Calcutta, even though Jaffer Ali Khan [Ja‘afar ‘Alī Khān] has not yet succeeded in obtaining the packet he has been tasked with intercepting. It further notes that he will use one of Samuel Manesty's cruizers, the HCC Teignmouth, for the task of conveying the expected packet from Jaffer Ali Khan.
